channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Caroline Kennedy Will 'Keep Her Daughter Tatiana’s Memory Alive' for Her Kids as 'Jackie Had to Do' After JFK's Assassination (Exclusive Source)
item.description: A Kennedy family friend speaks with PEOPLE about the heartbreaking aftermath of Tatiana Schlossberg's untimely death

item.title: Miley Cyrus' Malibu Home Inspired Her “Avatar: Fire and Ash” Song: 'I've Had My Own Experience with Rebuilding' (Exclusive)
item.description: The singer says “Dream as One,” featured in the new ‘Avatar’ movie, is about “finding that all you really need is each other”
